√pā3 'rise against'

BR. refer to such a root certain forms from the reduplicated middle stem pipī with prefix ud. Since, however, such forms occur with the unquestionable meaning 'drink', and, on the other hand, forms from ut-piba (ÇB.) with the meaning given to 3pā, it seems probable that we have here only a curiously specialized use of √1pā + ud.
